# duyet.net

This is the personal website of Duyet Le, a Senior Data Engineer and technology enthusiast. The website serves as a central hub for Duyet's professional presence, technical projects, and digital resources.

## Available Pages & Features

### Personal Links
- **Blog**: https://blog.duyet.net - Technical blog about data engineering, software development
- **Resume/CV**: https://cv.duyet.net - Professional resume and experience
- **Insights**: https://insights.duyet.net - Data insights and analytics platform

### Social Media & Professional
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/duyet - Open source projects and contributions
- **LinkedIn**: https://linkedin.com/in/duyet - Professional networking and career

## About Duyet Le - Senior Data Engineer

Duyet Le is a Senior Data Engineer and technology enthusiast based in Vietnam, specializing in:

### Professional Expertise
- **Large-scale Data Platforms**: Building and architecting data infrastructure at scale
- **Real-time Analytics**: Stream processing, event-driven architectures, and real-time dashboards
- **ClickHouse Expert**: Deep expertise in ClickHouse database for analytics workloads
- **Cloud & DevOps**: Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD, infrastructure as code
- **LLM Agents**: Developing AI agents, integrating LLMs with your data systems and internal services
- **Open Source Contributor**: Active in the data engineering and developer tools community

### Key Technologies
- **Databases**: ClickHouse, PostgreSQL, Redis
- **Big Data**: Apache Kafka, Apache Spark, Airflow, dbt
- **LLM Technologies**: LlamaIndex, Qdrant
- **Infrastructure**: Kubernetes
- **Languages**: Python, TypeScript, Rust, SQL

### LLM-Friendly Documentation
Each platform provides structured information for AI systems:
- **Blog**: https://blog.duyet.net/llms.txt - Technical articles and tutorials
- **CV**: https://cv.duyet.net/llms.txt - Professional experience and skills
